TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BoundField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 代表在資料繫結控制項中顯示為文字的欄位。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as text in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如和) 以文字顯示欄位的值。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display the value of a field as text. 物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制顯示物件做為資料行，而控制項顯示為一個資料列。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定的欄位中顯示物件、 設定屬性欄位的名稱。To specify the field to display in a object, set the property to the field's name. 欄位的值可以是 HTML 編碼顯示藉由設定之前屬性`true`。The field's value can be HTML-encoded before it is displayed by setting the property to `true`. 您也可以設定欄位的值套用自訂格式字串屬性。You can apply a custom formatting string to the field's value by setting the property. 當屬性是`true`，自訂格式字串中使用編碼的字串欄位的值。When the property is `true`, the encoded string value of the field is used in the custom format string. 根據預設，格式化字串會套用至欄位值，只有在資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時。By default, the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，設定屬性`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如果欄位的值是 null，您可以藉由設定顯示自訂標題屬性。If a field's value is null, you can display a custom caption by setting the property. 物件也會自動將轉換空字串 ("") 藉由設定欄位值為 null 值屬性`true`。The object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the property to `true`. 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件屬性`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 若要防止在編輯模式中修改欄位的值，將屬性`true`。To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 在資料繫結會控制該插入記錄的支援 (例如控制項)，您可以隱藏物件藉由設定屬性`false`。In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the control), you can hide a object by setting the property to `false`. 這通常是當您想要隱藏在插入模式下自動產生索引鍵欄位。This is commonly done when you want to hide an automatically generated key field in insert mode. 您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段物件。You can customize the header and footer sections of a object. 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示標題，請設定或屬性，分別。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or properties, respectively. 而不是顯示在標頭區段的文字，您可以藉由設定顯示影像屬性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 標頭區段可能會隱藏在物件藉由設定屬性`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支援這些資料繫結控制項個別的繫結欄位的屬性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 顯示或隱藏的整個標頭區段的資料繫結控制項 （如果有的話），請使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 您也可以自訂的外觀藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||頁尾區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||標頭區段的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的資料項目的樣式設定物件。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件中的欄位值顯示控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display the values of a field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundField/CS/boundfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundField/VB/boundfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public BoundField ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: BoundField();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要以動態方式加入物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果您使用控制項，加入物件集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 以靜態方式宣告所有欄位可都減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundFieldCtor/CS/boundfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundFieldCtor/VB/boundfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ApplyFormatInEditMode { get; set; }
.property instance bool ApplyFormatInEditMode
Public Overridable Property ApplyFormatInEditMode As Boolean
public: virtual property bool ApplyFormatInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示當包含 物件的資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時，是否將 屬性指定的格式字串套用至欄位值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the object is in edit mode.

value.span: 表示在編輯模式下將格式字串套用至欄位值，否則為 。

span.span: to apply the formatting string to field values in edit mode; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項 (例如， ，和) 可讓使用者讀取、 編輯或將記錄插入的不同的顯示模式。Data-bound controls (such as , , and ) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records. 依預設，格式化字串會指定由屬性套用至欄位值只有在資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時。By default, the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，設定屬性`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > A物件不會自動移除設定格式化的資料來源中更新的欄位時。A object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source. 如果您不想格式儲存的值的一部分，您必須移除的格式以程式設計的方式。If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，將套用的格式字串至欄位值時控制項處於編輯模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply the formatting string to field values while a control is in edit mode. 然後以程式設計方式移除格式設定，才能更新資料來源中的值。The formatting is then programmatically removed before the value is updated in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundFieldApplyFormatInEditMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/boundfieldapplyformatineditmode/CS/boundfieldapplyformatineditmodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundFieldApplyFormatInEditMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/boundfieldapplyformatineditmode/VB/boundfieldapplyformatineditmodevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ConvertEmptyStringToNull { get; set; }

public: virtual property bool ConvertEmptyStringToNull { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示在資料來源中更新資料欄位後，是否將空字串值 ("") 自動轉換為 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.

value.span: 表示將空字串值自動轉換為 null 值，否則為 。

span.span: to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, the .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候使用者可能會為欄位值，更新或插入資料錄時輸入空字串。Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用屬性來指定是否為空字串值會自動轉換為 null 的資料來源中更新資料欄位時。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，物件顯示 null 值為空字串。By default, a object displays null values as empty strings. 若要顯示不同的值，設定屬性。To display a different value, set the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定空字串 ("") 欄位值應該會自動轉換成 null。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that an empty string ("") field value should automatically be converted to null. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundFieldConvertEmptyStringToNull#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/boundfieldconvertemptystringtonull/CS/boundfieldconvertemptystingtonullcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundFieldConvertEmptyStringToNull#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/boundfieldconvertemptystringtonull/VB/boundfieldconvertemptystingtonullvb.aspx#1)]

An empty .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataField { get; set; }
.property instance string DataField
Public Overridable Property DataField As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要繫結至 物件之資料欄位的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind to the object.

value.span: 要繫結至 的資料欄位名稱。

span.span: The name of the data field to bind to the .

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要繫結至資料欄位的名稱物件。Use the property to specify the name of the data field to bind to the object. 指定之欄位的值都會顯示在物件做為文字。The values of the specified field are displayed in the object as text. 您可以選擇性地藉由設定格式化顯示的文字屬性。You can optionally format the displayed text by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果欄位的值是 null，空字串 ("") 會顯示預設值。If a field's value is null, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default. 若要指定替代的標題，請設定屬性。To specify an alternate caption, set the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定哪些欄位来顯示在欄位資料行中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which field to display in a field column of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundField/CS/boundfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundField/VB/boundfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定欄位值的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 指定欄位值顯示格式的格式化字串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式套用至該欄位值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式的值會顯示在物件。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果屬性未設定，該欄位的值會顯示不含任何特殊的格式。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的版本 ASP.NET 3.5，您必須設定屬性`false`才能設定格式的欄位沒有字串資料類型。In versions of ASP.NET earlier than 3.5, you must set the property to `false` in order to format fields that are not string data types. 否則，將欄位值已轉換字串之前儲存在格式字串的預設轉換方法屬性會套用。Otherwise, the field value is converted to a string by the default conversion method before the format string that is stored in the property is applied. 根據預設，格式字串套用至該欄位值，其中包含資料繫結控制項時，才物件處於唯讀模式。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至欄位值，在編輯模式中，設定屬性`true`。To apply the formatting string to field values while in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含該欄位值的預留位置。The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式化字串`Item Value: {0}`，當字串出現在欄位的值替換為 {0} 預留位置物件。For example, in the formatting string `Item Value: {0}`, the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the object. 格式化字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。The rest of the formatting string is displayed as literal text. 如果格式化的字串不包含預留位置，只格式化字串本身包含在最後顯示的文字 （從資料來源欄位的值就不會包含）。If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, only the formatting string itself is included in the final display text (the field's value from the data source is not included). 如果預留位置括在大括號，如上述範例所示為 0 （零），則欄位值的預設方法被轉換成字串。If the placeholder is a 0 (zero) enclosed in curly braces as shown in the preceding example, the field value is converted to a string by the default method. 您可以指定應如何格式化的欄位值的字串附加為零。You can append to the zero a string that specifies how the field value should be formatted. 例如，將預留位置`{0:C}`數值欄位會指定，欄位的值應轉換成貨幣格式。For example, the placeholder `{0:C}` for a numeric field specifies that value of the field should be converted to a currency format. 藉由套用格式方法。Formatting is applied by using the method. 後面的左大括號的數字是該方法所使用之語法的一部分，並指出預留位置應該使用哪一個的一系列的值。The number that follows the left curly brace is part of the syntax used by that method and indicates which one of a series of values the placeholder should use. 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，後面的左大括號的數字只可以設定為 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, the number that follows the left curly brace can only be set to 0. 下表列出標準格式字元的數值欄位。The following table lists the standard format characters for numeric fields. 這些格式的字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示在指定的情況下的十六進位字元。These format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 若要指定您想要顯示多少的有效位數或小數位數，您可以將數字附加至大部分的格式字元。You can append a number to most format characters in order to specify how many significant digits or decimal places you want to display. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下，格式取決於伺服器的文化特性設定。In most cases, formatting depends on the server's culture setting. 範例包括文化特性設定的`en-US`。The examples are for a culture setting of `en-US`. |格式字元Format character|描述Description|範例Example| |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| |`C` 或 `c``C` or `c`|以貨幣格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in currency format. 您可以指定小數位的數。You can specify the number of decimal places.|格式：`{0:C}`Format: `{0:C}`

123.456 -> $123.46123.456 -> $123.46

格式：`{0:C3}`Format: `{0:C3}`

123.456 -> $123.456123.456 -> $123.456| |`D` 或 `d``D` or `d`|顯示十進位格式的整數值。Displays integer values in decimal format. 您可以指定的位數。You can specify the number of digits. （雖然型別稱為 「 小 」，數字會格式化為整數。）(Although the type is referred to as "decimal", the numbers are formatted as integers.)|格式：`{0:D}`Format: `{0:D}`

1234 -> 12341234 -> 1234

格式：`{0:D6}`Format: `{0:D6}`

1234 -> 0012341234 -> 001234| |`E` 或 `e``E` or `e`|以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format. 您可以指定小數位的數。You can specify the number of decimal places.|格式：`{0:E}`Format: `{0:E}`

1052.0329112756 -> 1.052033E+0031052.0329112756 -> 1.052033E+003

格式：`{0:E2}`Format: `{0:E2}`

-1052.0329112756 -> -1.05e+003-1052.0329112756 -> -1.05e+003| |`F` 或 `f``F` or `f`|固定格式來顯示數值。Displays numeric values in fixed format. 您可以指定小數位的數。You can specify the number of decimal places.|格式：`{0:F}`Format: `{0:F}`

1234.567 -> 1234.571234.567 -> 1234.57

格式：`{0:F3}`Format: `{0:F3}`

1234.567 -> 1234.5671234.567 -> 1234.567| |`G` 或 `g``G` or `g`|數值會一般格式顯示 （最精簡的固定點和科學標記法）。Displays numeric values in general format (the most compact of either fixed-point or scientific notation). 您可以指定有效位數的數目。You can specify the number of significant digits.|格式：`{0:G}`Format: `{0:G}`

-123.456 -> -123.456-123.456 -> -123.456

格式：`{0:G2}`Format: `{0:G2}`

-123.456 -> -120-123.456 -> -120| |`N` 或 `n``N` or `n`|（包括群組分隔符號和選擇性負號） 的數字格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in number format (including group separators and optional negative sign). 您可以指定小數位的數。You can specify the number of decimal places.|格式：`{0:N}`Format: `{0:N}`

1234.567 -> 1,234.571234.567 -> 1,234.57

格式：`{0:N4}`Format: `{0:N4}`

1234.567 -> 1,234.56701234.567 -> 1,234.5670| |`P` 或 `p``P` or `p`|以百分比格式顯示數值。Displays numeric values in percent format. 您可以指定小數位的數。You can specify the number of decimal places.|格式：`{0:P}`Format: `{0:P}`

1 -> 100.00%1 -> 100.00%

格式：`{0:P1}`Format: `{0:P1}`

.5 -> 50.0%.5 -> 50.0%| |`R` 或 `r``R` or `r`|顯示， ，或`BigInteger`反覆存取格式中的值。Displays , , or `BigInteger` values in round-trip format.|格式：`{0:R}`Format: `{0:R}`

123456789.12345678 -> 123456789.12345678123456789.12345678 -> 123456789.12345678| |`X` 或 `x``X` or `x`|以十六進位格式顯示整數值。Displays integer values in hexadecimal format. 您可以指定的位數。You can specify the number of digits.|格式：`{0:X}`Format: `{0:X}`

255 -> FF255 -> FF

格式：`{0:x4}`Format: `{0:x4}`

255 -> 00ff255 -> 00ff| 如需詳細資訊，以及顯示其他文化特性值的格式設定的範例，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md). 您也可以建立自訂數值格式字串。You can also create custom numeric format strings. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). 下表列出的格式字元欄位。The following table lists format characters for fields. 大部分的這些格式規格會導致不同的輸出，根據文化特性設定而定。Most of these formatting specifications result in a different output depending on culture settings. 範例為用於值為 2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30 的文化特性設定`en-US`。The examples are for a value of 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM with a culture setting of `en-US`. |格式字元Format character|描述Description|範例Example| |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| |`d`|簡短日期模式。Short date pattern.|格式：`{0:d}`Format: `{0:d}`

6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 6/15/20096/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 6/15/2009| |`D`|完整日期模式。Long date pattern.|格式：`{0:D}`Format: `{0:D}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 2009 年 6 月 15 日，星期一6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM ->Monday, June 15, 2009| |`f`|完整日期/時間模式 (簡短時間)。Full date/time pattern (short time).|格式：`{0:f}`Format: `{0:f}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 2009 年 6 月 15 日，星期一下午 1:456/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 1:45 PM| |`F`|完整日期/時間模式 (完整時間)。Full date/time pattern (long time).|格式：`{0:F}`Format: `{0:F}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 2009 年 6 月 15 日，星期一下午 1:45:306/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 1:45:30 PM| |`g`|一般日期/時間模式 (簡短時間)。General date/time pattern (short time).|格式：`{0:g}`Format: `{0:g}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:456/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 6/15/2009 1:45 PM| |`G`|一般日期/時間模式 (完整時間)。General date/time pattern (long time).|格式：`{0:G}`Format: `{0:G}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:306/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM| |`M` 或 `m``M` or `m`|月/日模式。Month/day pattern.|格式：`{0:M}`Format: `{0:M}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 15 年 6 月6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> June 15| |`O` 或 `o``O` or `o`|來回日期/時間模式。Round-trip date/time pattern.|格式：`{0:o}`Format: `{0:o}`

6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15T13:45:30.09000006/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15T13:45:30.0900000| |`R` 或 `r``R` or `r`|RFC1123 模式 (資訊，請參閱)。RFC1123 pattern (for information, see ).|格式：`{0:R}`Format: `{0:R}`

6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Mon, 15 Jun 2009 20:45:30 GMT6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Mon, 15 Jun 2009 20:45:30 GMT| |`s`|可排序日期/時間模式。Sortable date/time pattern.|格式：`{0:s}`Format: `{0:s}`

6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15T13:45:306/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15T13:45:30| |`t`|簡短時間模式。Short time pattern.|格式：`{0:t}`Format: `{0:t}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 1:45 PM6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 1:45 PM| |`T`|完整時間模式。Long time pattern.|格式：`{0:T}`Format: `{0:T}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 1:45:30 PM6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 1:45:30 PM| |`u`|國際可排序日期/時間模式。Universal sortable date/time pattern.|格式：`{0:u}`Format: `{0:u}`

6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15 20:45:30Z6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15 20:45:30Z| |`U`|國際完整日期/時間模式。Universal full date/time pattern.|格式：`{0:U}`Format: `{0:U}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 2009 年 6 月 15 日，星期一下午 8:45:306/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 8:45:30 PM| |`Y` 或 `y``Y` or `y`|年月模式。Year month pattern.|格式：`{0:Y}`Format: `{0:Y}`

2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30-> 2009 年 6 月6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> June, 2009| 如需詳細資訊，以及顯示其他文化特性值的格式設定的範例，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 您也可以建立自訂日期和時間格式字串。You can also create custom date and time format strings. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191889)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191889). 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的欄位值的自訂顯示格式。The following example shows how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the values of a field. 下列範例顯示一個資料列由本範例所產生的輸出。The following example shows one row of the output that is produced by this example. |ProductIDProductID|名稱Name|ProductNumberProductNumber|ListPriceListPrice|加權Weight|ModifiedDateModifiedDate| |---------------|----------|-------------------|---------------|------------|------------------| |`000680`|`HL Road Frame - Black, 58`|`#FR-R92B-58`|`$1,431.50`|`1016.040`|`3/11/2004`|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供便利的方式來擷取欄位的值從指定為物件存放至物件。The method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in a object. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 這個方法不會傳回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反地，將欄位值傳回透過傳物件傳入的`dictionary`參數。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 在呼叫方法之後，逐一查看物件來存取的欄位值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 如果物件包含唯讀欄位，則必須傳入`true`如`includeReadOnly`參數來包含這些值。If the object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷何值轉譯時，顯示欄位設計工具中的物件。The method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the object in a designer. 如果無法擷取實際資料從資料來源，在設計階段，改為顯示這個方法所傳回的值。If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回不同的值，以顯示在設計工具中的欄位。

remarks.format:
## Remarks HTML 編碼的值，可協助防止跨網站指令碼的攻擊和惡意內容顯示。HTML-encoding values can help prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed. HTML 編碼時也很有用您想要顯示在瀏覽器，例如顯示字串的 HTML 程式碼 」\"而不會插入分行符號 (`
`項目) 中的頁面。HTML encoding is also useful when you want to display HTML code in the browser, such as displaying the string "\
" instead of inserting a line break (`
` element) in the page. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是在 ASP.NET 3.5 中新功能。This property is new in ASP.NET 3.5. 此屬性設定為`false`還原的預設行為3.5 之前版本的 ASP.NET 中的屬性。Setting this property to `false` restores the default behavior of the property in versions of ASP.NET earlier than 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由資料控制項與其呼叫物件與其相關聯執行基本物件初始化的欄位之前的欄位加到資料列集合, 的執行個體。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection. 資料控制項，例如和呼叫方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法，這類其他方法之前`CreateRow`呼叫以建立特定的資料列與資料。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data. 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的物件來執行基本的初始設定物件。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for a object. 實作這個方法，如果您-衍生型別需要的任何物件初始設定之前它所擴展,物件與資料或控制項中方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時欄位的值會在資料來源中儲存為 null。Sometimes a field's value is stored as null in the data source. 您可以指定自訂顯示藉由設定具有 null 值的欄位標題屬性。You can specify a custom caption to display for fields that have a null value by setting the property. 如果未設定這個屬性，null 的欄位值顯示為空字串 ("")。If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings (""). 時記錄是正在更新或插入資料繫結控制項中，如果使用者輸入值所指定欄位在資料繫結控制項中，這個屬性 （而不是空字串），值會自動轉換為 null 的資料來源中。When a record is being updated or inserted in a data-bound control, if the user enters the value specified by this property (other than an empty string) for a field in a data-bound control, that value is automatically converted to null in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 若要將空白的字串欄位值轉換成 null 值，設定屬性`true`。To convert an empty string field value to a null value, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要針對 null 的欄位值顯示的自訂標題。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom caption to display for null field values. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundFieldNullDisplayText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundFieldNullDisplayText/CS/boundfieldnulldisplaytextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundFieldNullDisplayText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundFieldNullDisplayText/VB/boundfieldnulldisplaytextvb.aspx#1)]

protected: virtual void OnDataBindField(System::Object ^ sender, EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The source of the event.
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 將欄位值繫結至 物件。

span.span: Binds the value of a field to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來繫結中的對應資料格的資料來源中的欄位值物件。The method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding cell in the object.

exception.span: 欄位值繫結至的控制項不是 或 。

span.span: The control to which the field value is bound is not a or a .

para.span: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂繫結常式。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to perform a custom binding routine.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool ReadOnly { get; set; }
.property instance bool ReadOnly
Public Overridable Property ReadOnly As Boolean
public: virtual property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否可以在編輯模式下修改欄位值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the field can be modified in edit mode.

value.span: 表示要防止在編輯模式下修改欄位值，否則為 。

span.span: to prevent the value of the field from being modified in edit mode; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可防止系統在顯示的值遭到修改的物件。Use the property to prevent the values displayed in a object from being modified. 當資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時，則是唯讀的欄位會顯示為純文字，不含任何編輯控制項。When a data-bound control is in edit mode, fields that are read-only are displayed as plain text, without any editing controls. > [!NOTE] > 屬性僅適用於編輯模式。The property applies only to edit mode. 若要防止欄位出現在插入模式下，使用屬性。To prevent fields from showing up in insert mode, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可防止系統在顯示的索引鍵欄位值物件處於編輯模式下修改。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent the values of the key field displayed in a object from being modified in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[BoundField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundField/CS/boundfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BoundField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BoundField/VB/boundfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，表示 物件是否支援 HTML 編碼。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether HTML encoding is supported by a object.

value.span: 永遠傳回 ，以指出 支援 HTML 編碼。

span.span: Always returns to indicate that HTML encoding is supported by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是所使用的協助程式屬性類別和衍生的類別，以判斷該類別是否支援 HTML 編碼。The property is a helper property used by the class and derived classes to determine whether HTML encoding is supported by the class.

para.span: 衍生自類別，您可以覆寫這個屬性，指出類別是否支援 HTML 編碼。

span.span: When deriving from the class, you can override this property to indicate whether HTML encoding is supported by the class.

public: static initonly System::String ^ ThisExpression;

summary.span: 代表 "this" 運算式。

span.span: Represents the "this" expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個欄位用來指出物件應該繫結的目標資料來源本身，而不是資料來源的欄位。This field is used to indicate that the object should bind against the data source itself, rather than a field of the data source. 在此情況下，物件的`ToString`欄位中，將會顯示值。In this case, the object's `ToString` value will be displayed in the field. 主要由控制項開發人員使用此欄位。This field is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定控制項是否驗證用戶端輸入。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the control validates client input or not.

value.span: 決定控制項是否驗證用戶端輸入的值。

span.span: A value that determines whether the control validates client input or not.

value.span: 預設值為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();

summary.span: 判斷 物件中所包含的控制項是否支援回呼 (Callback)。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在支援回呼的物件。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 這個方法已經作為空方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），表示支援回呼實作。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
